import React, { useState } from "react"; import NumberFormat from "react-number-format"; function Form(props) { const [amount, setAmount] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [type, setType] = useState("Income"); const addButton = () => { props.addRecent({amount: Number(amount)}) props.setAddForm(); }; return (
setAmount(e.target.value)} />
setDescription(e.target.value)} autoComplete="off" autoCapitalize="words" required />

Select the type of transaction:

setType(e.target.value)} />

); } export default Form;
